item.title: Cron-Ease

item.title: Viant Technology - Full Stack Intern
item.description: Responsibilities/Accomplishments As a Full Stack Intern in the Platform team I - Added an upload functionality in the UI to automate the process of adding third-party segments to the database using Angular, Golang, AWS Lambda, APIGateway, and S3; saved 6+ engineer hours per week Developing a feature for transcoding videos to audio using AWS MediaConvert, SNS, DynamoDB, and EventBridge, increasing the bid eligibility for clientsâ€™ ad campaigns and thereby increasing the generated revenue Contributed to the architecture for the Video-to-Audio Conversion project Leveraged Go Generics to make it easier to add/fetch objects from DynamoDB
